sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNENTRPRSMBER ( ESNTL_ID , ENTRPRS_MBER_ID , ENTRPRS_SE_CODE , BIZRNO , JURIRNO , CMPNY_NM , CXFC , ZIP , ADRES , ENTRPRS_MIDDLE_TELNO , FXNUM , INDUTY_CODE , APPLCNT_NM , SBSCRB_DE , ENTRPRS_MBER_STTUS , ENTRPRS_MBER_PASSWORD , ENTRPRS_MBER_PASSWORD_HINT , ENTRPRS_MBER_PASSWORD_CNSR , GROUP_ID , DETAIL_ADRES , ENTRPRS_END_TELNO , AREA_NO , APPLCNT_EMAIL_ADRES , APPLCNT_IHIDNUM, MBTLNUM , NICK , CMPNY_NM_OTHBC_AT , BIZRNO_OTHBC_AT , NICK_OTHBC_AT , JOB_AREA , JOB_TYPE , JOB_CLASS , JOB_OTHBC_AT , ESTABLISH_YEAR , ESTABLISH_MONTH , ESTABLISH_DAY , ESTABLISH_OTHBC_AT , REPRSNT_EMAIL_ADRES , REPRSNT_EMAIL_ADRES_OTHBC_AT , REPRSNT_RECV_AT , REPRSNT_AREA_NO , REPRSNT_ENTRPRS_MIDDLE_TELNO , REPRSNT_ENTRPRS_END_TELNO , TEL_OTHBC_AT , FXNUM_OTHBC_AT , ATCH_BIZ_FILE_ID , PSTINST_DEPT_NM , OFCPS_NM , APPLCNT_RECV_AT , ADRES_OTHBC_AT ) VALUES ( #uniqId#, #entrprsmberId#, #entrprsSeCode#, #bizrno#, #jurirno#, #cmpnyNm#, #cxfc#, #zip#, #adres#, #entrprsMiddleTelno#, #fxnum#, #indutyCode#, #applcntNm#, sysdate, #entrprsMberSttus#, #entrprsMberPassword#, #entrprsMberPasswordHint#, #entrprsMberPasswordCnsr#, #groupId#, #detailAdres#, #entrprsEndTelno#, #areaNo#, #applcntEmailAdres#, #applcntIhidnum#, #mbtlnum#, #nick#, #cmpnyNmOthbcAt#, #bizrnoOthbcAt#, #nickOthbcAt#, #jobArea#, #jobType#, #jobClass#, #jobOthbcAt#, #establishYear#, #establishMonth#, #establishDay#, #establishOthbcAt#, #reprsntEmailAdres#, #reprsntEmailAdresOthbcAt#, #reprsntRecvAt#, #reprsntAreaNo#, #reprsntEntrprsMiddleTelno#, #reprsntEntrprsEndTelno#, #telOthbcAt#, #fxnumOthbcAt#, #atchBizFileId#, #pstinstDeptNm#, #ofcpsNm#, #applcntRecvAt#, #adresOthbcAt# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT ESNTL_ID uniqId, 'USR02' userTy, ENTRPRS_MBER_ID entrprsmberId, ENTRPRS_SE_CODE entrprsSeCode, BIZRNO bizrno, JURIRNO jurirno, CMPNY_NM cmpnyNm, CXFC cxfc, ZIP zip, ADRES adres, ENTRPRS_MIDDLE_TELNO entrprsMiddleTelno, FXNUM fxnum, INDUTY_CODE indutyCode, APPLCNT_NM applcntNm, SBSCRB_DE sbscrbDe, ENTRPRS_MBER_STTUS entrprsMberSttus, ENTRPRS_MBER_PASSWORD entrprsMberPassword, ENTRPRS_MBER_PASSWORD_HINT entrprsMberPasswordHint, ENTRPRS_MBER_PASSWORD_CNSR entrprsMberPasswordCnsr, GROUP_ID groupId, DETAIL_ADRES detailAdres, ENTRPRS_END_TELNO entrprsEndTelno, AREA_NO areaNo, APPLCNT_IHIDNUM applcntIhidnum, APPLCNT_EMAIL_ADRES applcntEmailAdres FROM COMTNENTRPRSMBER WHERE ESNTL_ID=#uniqId#

SELECT ESNTL_ID uniqId, 'USR02' userTy, ENTRPRS_MBER_ID entrprsmberId, ENTRPRS_SE_CODE entrprsSeCode, BIZRNO bizrno, JURIRNO jurirno, CMPNY_NM cmpnyNm, CXFC cxfc, ZIP zip, ADRES adres, ENTRPRS_MIDDLE_TELNO entrprsMiddleTelno, FXNUM fxnum, INDUTY_CODE indutyCode, APPLCNT_NM applcntNm, SBSCRB_DE sbscrbDe, ENTRPRS_MBER_STTUS entrprsMberSttus, ENTRPRS_MBER_PASSWORD entrprsMberPassword, ENTRPRS_MBER_PASSWORD_HINT entrprsMberPasswordHint, ENTRPRS_MBER_PASSWORD_CNSR entrprsMberPasswordCnsr, GROUP_ID groupId, DETAIL_ADRES detailAdres, ENTRPRS_END_TELNO entrprsEndTelno, AREA_NO areaNo, APPLCNT_IHIDNUM applcntIhidnum, APPLCNT_EMAIL_ADRES applcntEmailAdres, MBTLNUM mbtlnum, NICK nick, CMPNY_NM_OTHBC_AT cmpnyNmOthbcAt, BIZRNO_OTHBC_AT bizrnoOthbcAt, NICK_OTHBC_AT nickOthbcAt, JOB_AREA jobArea, JOB_TYPE jobType, JOB_CLASS jobClass, JOB_OTHBC_AT jobOthbcAt, ESTABLISH_YEAR establishYear, ESTABLISH_MONTH establishMonth, ESTABLISH_DAY establishDay, ESTABLISH_OTHBC_AT establishOthbcAt, REPRSNT_EMAIL_ADRES reprsntEmailAdres, REPRSNT_EMAIL_ADRES_OTHBC_AT reprsntEmailAdresOthbcAt, REPRSNT_RECV_AT reprsntRecvAt, REPRSNT_AREA_NO reprsntAreaNo, REPRSNT_ENTRPRS_MIDDLE_TELNO reprsntEntrprsMiddleTelno, REPRSNT_ENTRPRS_END_TELNO reprsntEntrprsEndTelno, TEL_OTHBC_AT telOthbcAt, FXNUM_OTHBC_AT fxnumOthbcAt, ATCH_BIZ_FILE_ID atchBizFileId, PSTINST_DEPT_NM pstinstDeptNm, OFCPS_NM ofcpsNm, APPLCNT_RECV_AT applcntRecvAt, ATCH_IMG_LOGO_FILE_ID atchImgLogoFileId, ATCH_IMG_1_FILE_ID atchImg1FileId, ATCH_IMG_2_FILE_ID atchImg2FileId, ATCH_IMG_3_FILE_ID atchImg3FileId, ATCH_IMG_4_FILE_ID atchImg4FileId, SHORT_NOTICE shortNotice, HOMEPAGE_URL homepageUrl, BLOG_URL blogUrl, SOCIAL_URL socialUrl, NVL(EMP_CNT,0) empCnt, NVL(CAPITAL_MONEY,0) capitalMoney, NVL(SALES_MONEY,0) salesMoney, ATCH_REPORT_FILE_ID atchReportFileId, ATCH_PORT_FILE_ID atchPortFileId, MNG_NM mngNm, MNG_PSTINST_DEPT_NM mngPstinstDeptNm, MNG_OFCPS_NM mngOfcpsNm, MNG_EMAIL_ADRES mngEmailAdres, MNG_MBTLNUM mngMbtlnum, MNG_AREA_NO mngAreaNo, MNG_ENTRPRS_MIDDLE_TELNO mngEntrprsMiddleTelno, MNG_ENTRPRS_END_TELNO mngEntrprsEndTelno, TAX_NM taxNm, TAX_PSTINST_DEPT_NM taxPstinstDeptNm, TAX_OFCPS_NM taxOfcpsNm, TAX_EMAIL_ADRES taxEmailAdres, TAX_MBTLNUM taxMbtlnum, TAX_AREA_NO taxAreaNo, TAX_ENTRPRS_MIDDLE_TELNO taxEntrprsMiddleTelno, TAX_ENTRPRS_END_TELNO taxEntrprsEndTelno, NOTICE notice, CXFC_OTHBC_AT cxfcOthbcAt, ADRES_OTHBC_AT adresOthbcAt FROM COMTNENTRPRSMBER WHERE ENTRPRS_MBER_ID=#entrprsmberId#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMTNENTRPRSMBER SET ENTRPRS_MBER_ID = #entrprsmberId#, ENTRPRS_SE_CODE = #entrprsSeCode#, BIZRNO = #bizrno#, JURIRNO = #jurirno#, CMPNY_NM = #cmpnyNm#, CXFC = #cxfc#, ZIP = #zip#, ADRES = #adres#, ENTRPRS_MIDDLE_TELNO = #entrprsMiddleTelno#, FXNUM = #fxnum#, INDUTY_CODE = #indutyCode#, APPLCNT_NM = #applcntNm#, ENTRPRS_MBER_STTUS = #entrprsMberSttus#, ENTRPRS_MBER_PASSWORD_HINT = #entrprsMberPasswordHint#, ENTRPRS_MBER_PASSWORD_CNSR = #entrprsMberPasswordCnsr#, GROUP_ID = #groupId#, DETAIL_ADRES = #detailAdres#, ENTRPRS_END_TELNO = #entrprsEndTelno#, AREA_NO = #areaNo#, APPLCNT_EMAIL_ADRES = #applcntEmailAdres# WHERE ESNTL_ID=#uniqId#

UPDATE COMTNENTRPRSMBER SET ENTRPRS_SE_CODE = #entrprsSeCode#, BIZRNO = #bizrno#, JURIRNO = #jurirno#, CMPNY_NM = #cmpnyNm#, CXFC = #cxfc#, ZIP = #zip#, ADRES = #adres#, ENTRPRS_MIDDLE_TELNO = #entrprsMiddleTelno#, FXNUM = #fxnum#, INDUTY_CODE = #indutyCode#, APPLCNT_NM = #applcntNm#, GROUP_ID = #groupId#, DETAIL_ADRES = #detailAdres#, ENTRPRS_END_TELNO = #entrprsEndTelno#, AREA_NO = #areaNo#, APPLCNT_EMAIL_ADRES = #applcntEmailAdres#, MBTLNUM = #mbtlnum#, NICK = #nick#, CMPNY_NM_OTHBC_AT = #cmpnyNmOthbcAt#, BIZRNO_OTHBC_AT = #bizrnoOthbcAt#, NICK_OTHBC_AT = #nickOthbcAt#, JOB_AREA = #jobArea#, JOB_TYPE = #jobType#, JOB_CLASS = #jobClass#, JOB_OTHBC_AT = #jobOthbcAt#, ESTABLISH_YEAR = #establishYear#, ESTABLISH_MONTH = #establishMonth#, ESTABLISH_DAY = #establishDay#, ESTABLISH_OTHBC_AT = #establishOthbcAt#, REPRSNT_EMAIL_ADRES = #reprsntEmailAdres#, REPRSNT_EMAIL_ADRES_OTHBC_AT = #reprsntEmailAdresOthbcAt#, REPRSNT_RECV_AT = #reprsntRecvAt#, REPRSNT_AREA_NO = #reprsntAreaNo#, REPRSNT_ENTRPRS_MIDDLE_TELNO = #reprsntEntrprsMiddleTelno#, REPRSNT_ENTRPRS_END_TELNO = #reprsntEntrprsEndTelno#, TEL_OTHBC_AT = #telOthbcAt#, FXNUM_OTHBC_AT = #fxnumOthbcAt#, ATCH_BIZ_FILE_ID = #atchBizFileId#, PSTINST_DEPT_NM = #pstinstDeptNm#, OFCPS_NM = #ofcpsNm#, APPLCNT_RECV_AT = #applcntRecvAt#, CXFC_OTHBC_AT = #cxfcOthbcAt#, ADRES_OTHBC_AT =#adresOthbcAt# WHERE ESNTL_ID=#uniqId#

UPDATE COMTNENTRPRSMBER SET ATCH_IMG_LOGO_FILE_ID = #atchImgLogoFileId#, ATCH_IMG_1_FILE_ID = #atchImg1FileId#, ATCH_IMG_2_FILE_ID = #atchImg2FileId#, ATCH_IMG_3_FILE_ID = #atchImg3FileId#, ATCH_IMG_4_FILE_ID = #atchImg4FileId#, SHORT_NOTICE = #shortNotice#, HOMEPAGE_URL = #homepageUrl#, BLOG_URL = #blogUrl#, SOCIAL_URL = #socialUrl#, EMP_CNT = #empCnt#, CAPITAL_MONEY = #capitalMoney#, SALES_MONEY = #salesMoney#, ATCH_REPORT_FILE_ID = #atchReportFileId#, ATCH_PORT_FILE_ID = #atchPortFileId#, MNG_NM = #mngNm#, MNG_PSTINST_DEPT_NM = #mngPstinstDeptNm#, MNG_OFCPS_NM = #mngOfcpsNm#, MNG_EMAIL_ADRES = #mngEmailAdres#, MNG_MBTLNUM = #mngMbtlnum#, MNG_AREA_NO = #mngAreaNo#, MNG_ENTRPRS_MIDDLE_TELNO = #mngEntrprsMiddleTelno#, MNG_ENTRPRS_END_TELNO = #mngEntrprsEndTelno#, TAX_NM = #taxNm#, TAX_PSTINST_DEPT_NM = #taxPstinstDeptNm#, TAX_OFCPS_NM = #taxOfcpsNm#, TAX_EMAIL_ADRES = #taxEmailAdres#, TAX_MBTLNUM = #taxMbtlnum#, TAX_AREA_NO = #taxAreaNo#, TAX_ENTRPRS_MIDDLE_TELNO = #taxEntrprsMiddleTelno#, TAX_ENTRPRS_END_TELNO = #taxEntrprsEndTelno#, NOTICE = #notice# WHERE ESNTL_ID=#uniqId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT USE_STPLAT_ID , USE_STPLAT_CN , INFO_PROVD_AGRE_CN FROM COMTNSTPLATINFO WHERE USE_STPLAT_ID=#stplatId#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMTNENTRPRSMBER SET ENTRPRS_MBER_PASSWORD = #entrprsMberPassword# WHERE ESNTL_ID = #uniqId#
UPDATE COMTNENTRPRSMBER SET ENTRPRS_MBER_STTUS = 'W' WHERE ENTRPRS_MBER_ID = #entrprsmberId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT ENTRPRS_MBER_PASSWORD entrprsMberPassword FROM COMTNENTRPRSMBER WHERE ESNTL_ID=#uniqId#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT ESNTL_ID as "uniqId", 'USR02' as "userTy", ENTRPRS_MBER_ID as "userId", CMPNY_NM as "cmpnyNm", APPLCNT_NM as "userNm", APPLCNT_EMAIL_ADRES as "emailAdres", AREA_NO as "areaNo", ENTRPRS_MIDDLE_TELNO as "middleTelno", ENTRPRS_END_TELNO as "endTelno", '' as "moblphonNo", GROUP_ID as "groupId", ENTRPRS_MBER_STTUS as "sttus", SBSCRB_DE as "sbscrbDe" FROM COMTNENTRPRSMBER WHERE 1=1
ENTRPRS_MBER_STTUS LIKE #sbscrbSttus#
ENTRPRS_MBER_ID LIKE #searchKeyword#
APPLCNT_NM LIKE '%' ||#searchKeyword#|| '%'
ORDER BY 13 DESC ) TB ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(1) totcnt FROM COMTNENTRPRSMBER WHERE 1=1
ENTRPRS_MBER_STTUS LIKE #sbscrbSttus#
ENTRPRS_MBER_ID LIKE #searchKeyword#
APPLCNT_NM LIKE '%' ||#searchKeyword#|| '%'
